description:
This course is focused on teaching, a student to develop Android mobile app in Eclipse

Course has Video material, Source codes and presentation slides

To complete this course you will need about 4 hours.

Course is made of 4 chapters Installation, Introduction to java programing, Monetization and app creation

If you want to learn how to make simple mobile apps, and create your own mobile app business this course is right for you.
title: Android Mobile App Creation: How to Build & Monetize Apps
